priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Coronary Artery Dominance Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C101860

self.title: CDISC SDTM Coronary Artery Dominance Terminology

definition: A codelist to describe the pattern of the epicardial vessels supplying the posterior descending artery and the posterolateral branches.
name: Coronary Artery Dominance
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Coronary Artery Dominance Terminology

terms.definition: The right coronary artery supplies the posterior descending artery and the circumflex supplies the posterolateral branches.
The left circumflex artery supplies the posterior descending artery and the posterolateral branches.
The right coronary artery supplies the posterior descending artery and the posterolateral branches.
